FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Echo of the MSG-ID field from the Mnemonic Value Request message.

FIELD.NAME: FINAL-MESSAGE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: When true, indicates the last message in the stream.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-MNEMONICS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Total number of mnemonics in this message

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the first mnemonic.

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Status of the first mnemonic: valid mnemonic, or valid mnemonic with no data, or invalid mnemonic (1: Valid, 2: Valid, No data, 3: Invalid)

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.UNITS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Units associated with the value converted to engineering units for the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.NUM-OF-SAMPLES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of data samples for the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.TIME-STAMP
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time stamp for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.RAW-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.EU-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value converted to Engineering Units if engineering units conversion is present for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.TEXT-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value converted to a text string if text conversion is present for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.FLAGS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Flags native to the T&C component for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.LIMIT-ENABLE-DISABLE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the limit checking state for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.RED-HIGH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Red High limit status for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.RED-LOW
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Red Low limit status for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.YELLOW-HIGH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Yellow High limit status for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.YELLOW-LOW
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Yellow Low limit status for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.STATIC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the static (stale) condition for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.SAMPLE.1.QUALITY
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Quality for the first data sample of the first mnemonic
